column1: hussite_DESC;Heavily influenced by the Lollard movement within the Catholic Church
column2: the Hussite heretics were a proto-Protestant movement who advocated nationalism and increasing awareness to social issues. Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! Autocephalous Patriarchs under Kings\n§Y*§! Patriarchs can grant divorces;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tondrakian_DESC;Tondrakians are a heretical Christian sect which may have been a derivative of Paulicianism originating in the city of Tondrak
column2:
Armenia. They deny the sacramentality of marriage and thus encourages sexual promiscuity. They have no formal rites and no strict church hierarchy. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! There is no religious head
§Y*§! Tondrakians may install women as priests
§Y*§! Tondrakians may have concubines;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sufi_DESC;Sufism is distinct from both Shi'a and Sunni Islam. Sufis believe they are practicing the perfection of worship
column2: or ihsan as revealed by Gabriel to Mohammad. They are known for their practice of repeating the names of God as well as their asceticism. Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! The Sufi Caliphate is held by a secular ruler
column3:
and can cease to exist.
§Y*§! The Sufi Caliph can subjugate other Ibadi rulers freely
§Y*§! The Sufi Caliph can declare great Jihads
§Y*§! Sufi rulers can - and are expected to have - multiple wives
§Y*§! Temple Holdings can be held by anyone without penalty
§Y*§! Sufi dynasties grow decadent unless the men have enough land and win wars;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kabbalah_DESC;Kabbalah Judaism is a Jewish movement with Gnostic influences. Adopting relgious thoughts from other religions
column2: Kabbalah is a set of esoteric teachings meant to explain the relationship between an unchanging
column5:
and the mortal and finite universe. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! There is no religious head
§Y*§! Kabbalah Jews may install women as priests
§Y*§! Can restore Israel if the Promised Land is reclaimed;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: d_sufi;The Sufi Caliphate;Califat Suffite;Das Suffi-Kalifat;;El Califato Sufi;;;;;;;;;x
d_hurufi;The Hurufi Skeikhdom;Le cheikhat hurufiste;Das Hurufi-Scheichtum;;Hurufismo;;;;;;;;;x
